document.full_text: the n.h.l. did not suspend vancouver's alexandre burrows for biting boston's patrice bergeron and the incident will fade into sports biting history.
document.title: burrows's bite, unpunished, joins legion of chomping incidents
lines_and_colors: the n.h.l. did not suspend vancouver's alexandre burrows for biting boston's patrice bergeron and the incident will fade into sports biting history.
